body_html: OK, in that case I think there is a problem with your CUDA installation. Can you try reinstalling CUDA 8.0? (For those following along, I've added a check for NVCUDA.DLL to the self-check script.)
body_text: OK, in that case I think there is a problem with your CUDA installation. Can you try reinstalling CUDA 8.0? (For those following along, I've added a check for NVCUDA.DLL to the self-check script.)
body: OK, in that case I think there is a problem with your CUDA installation. Can you try reinstalling CUDA 8.0? (For those following along, I've added a check for `NVCUDA.DLL` to the self-check script.)
